alert.note: Alert for Bullitt; Jefferson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 12:39PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A gusty shower will impact portions of northwestern Spencer, west central Shelby, southeastern Jefferson and northeastern Bullitt Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1238 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gusty shower with weak rotation near Pioneer Village, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Middletown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This gusty shower may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
